column1: Magnetic resonance image (MRI) size (128, 256, 1) capturing the head of a man aged  of 37 years old, with a sequence weighted in T2 and sagittal section. The specific slice is number 141, counted from the right hemisphere of the skull. We see the brainstem of volume 313.7695 mm³, the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 4721.0449 mm³, the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 4910.8887 mm³, the right lateral ventricle of volume 257.0801 mm³, the white matter of right hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 652.5879 mm³, the right cerebellar cortex of volume 1621.5820 mm³, the right thalamus proper of volume 477.2461 mm³, the right caudate nucleus of volume 315.0879 mm³, the right putamen of volume 5.2734 mm³, the right globus pallidus of volume 14.5020 mm³, the right hippocampus of volume 21.0938 mm³, the right amygdala of volume 32.9590 mm³, the right nucleus accumbens of volume 39.5508 mm³ and the right ventral diencephalon of volume 170.0684 mm³.
